title: cant buy rp
body: cant buy rp with my card in client, says error when purchasing

replies.body: Heya, this could happen if there's an issue with the method of payment or the processing itself.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in this case so our billing team can look into this with you privately and find some options.
